name: 3dTqual
author: AFNI Team
description: Computes a quality index for each sub-brick in a 3D+time dataset.

inputs.description: Quality index is 1 minus the Spearman (rank) correlation coefficient of each sub-brick with the median sub-brick (default method).
inputs.name: Spearman correlation flag

inputs.description: Quality index is 1 minus the quadrant correlation coefficient as the quality index.
inputs.name: Quadrant correlation flag

inputs.description: Clip off low-intensity regions in the median sub-brick, only compute correlation between high-intensity voxels.
inputs.name: Autoclip flag

inputs.description: Automatically mask and compute correlation only across high-intensity (presumably brain) voxels.
inputs.name: Automask flag

inputs.description: Clip off values below given threshold in the median sub-brick.
inputs.name: Clip value

inputs.description: Compute correlation only across masked voxels from the given dataset.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Print the median-3.5*MAD and median+3.5*MAD values with each quality index for plotting.
inputs.name: Range flag

output-files.description: The 1D time series with the quality index for each sub-brick
output-files.name: Quality Index Time Series
